name: Stone Juggernaut
speed: 50 ft. (in one direction chosen at the start of its turn)
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

traits.Devastating Roll: The juggernaut can move through the space of a prone creature. A creature whose space the juggernaut enters for the first time on a turn must make a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
traits.Immutable Form: The juggernaut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.Regeneration: As long as it has 1 hit point left, the juggernaut magically regains all its hit points daily at dawn. The juggernaut is destroyed and doesn't regenerate if it drops to 0 hit points.
traits.Siege Monster: The juggernaut deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
